name: Alkmaarse Eigenste

config_properties.name: Alkmaarse Eigenste
config_properties.description: A single-day discovery festival in Alkmaar showcasing local and emerging artists.

ai_profile:
**Alkmaarse Eigenste 2026: A Celebration of Dutch Talent and Eclectic Sounds**

Alkmaarse Eigenste 2026 brings together 25 diverse and talented artists, all hailing from the Netherlands, for a vibrant showcase of musical creativity. This year’s lineup highlights the festival’s commitment to celebrating homegrown talent and features a wide variety of genres, with a strong emphasis on alternative and rock music. From alternative rock and indie pop to soul, shoegaze, and post-punk, the festival promises an eclectic mix that caters to a wide range of musical tastes. Lesser-seen genres like alt-pop-noir, world music, and improvisational jazz also make an appearance, offering something for everyone.

The festival proudly reflects a balanced gender representation, with female and male artists equally represented, alongside bands and artists with undisclosed gender identities. While most of the artists are not people of color, the festival’s lineup also includes one artist of color and a number of others whose backgrounds are unknown, highlighting some room for growth in terms of diversity. This year’s lineup reflects the festival’s ongoing efforts to foster inclusivity and broaden its cultural scope.

With 16 of the acts featuring Spotify links, audiences can explore much of the lineup ahead of the event and get a taste of the unique sounds that will take center stage in 2026. Whether you’re drawn to the dreamy vibes of indie folk, the energy of punk-influenced rock, or the soulful tones of blues and jazz, Alkmaarse Eigenste 2026 promises an unforgettable experience that celebrates the creativity and diversity of Dutch music.
